tool.name: Minfi Get SNP
tool.description: retrieve the chromosome and the position of each SNP

configfiles.configfile:
require("minfi", quietly = TRUE)
GRSet <- get(load('$input1'))
snps <- getSnpInfo(GRSet)
write.table(snps, '$output1')

tool.help: Function To Retrieve The Chromosome And The Position Of Each SNP On A Given Affymetrix SNP Array
